ee mahatha me bawa kiya sitiye janamadhya amathyansha shrawanagarayedi eeye (15) paswaruwe pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemini.ohuta erehi siyalu karunu sarath fonseka mahathata erehiwa kriyathmaka mulika parikshanawalin anawaranaya wi thibena bawath mathiwarana samaye kumanthrana pawathi bawata ehi prathipalawalin pasuwa athi salasumwalin heliwana bawath mahacharyawaraya kiweya.wishwawidyala mahacharyawarun hatiyata mewani kriyadamayan pilibandawa awadhanayen sitina bawa penwa dun gamini samaranayaka mahatha pasugiya mathiwaranaya le wilakin awasan wimata ida thibu bawada sandahan keleya.dashaka thunakata aasanna kalayak me rate pawathi thrasthawadi aragalayen jayagath pasu rate siyalu denama sathutata pathwu bawa sihipath kala ee mahatha lowa oonama rataka swairithwayak, honda hamudawak, widhimath adhyapanayak ha winayagaruka samajayak pawathiya yuthu bawada penwa dunneya.apage wirodhara ranawiruwan lowa kisidu ratakata nodeweni aakarayata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage nayakathwaya yatathe yuddhayen jayagath bawa awadharanaya kala wishwawidyala prathipadana komishan sabhawe sabhapathiwaraya ee kriyadamaya samastha lokayama mawithayata path kirimata samath wu bawada penwa dunneya.yuddhaya pawathi kala samayedi wiwidha balapam eeta erehiwa paminiyada ee kisiwekutath apa yata nowu bawa ki gamini samaranayaka mahatha hitapu hamudapathi saha aarakshaka mandalika pradhani sarath fonseka mahatha ee thanathuren iwathwa janadhipathiwaranaya sandaha apekshakayeku lesa idiripath wu bawada kiya sitiyeya.shashri jayawardhanapura wishwawidyalaye upa kulapathi aacharya en. el. ee. karunarathna, kolambaa wishwawidyalaye mahacharya laksiri pranandu, kalaniya wishwawidyalaye aacharya rohana lakshman piyadasa, kolambaa wishwawidyalaye aacharya prathibha mahanama hewa, uuwa wellassa wishwawidyalaye upa kulapathi chandra ambauldeniya mahathwaruda me awasthawata ekwuha.
